Posts.Content: Apr 3, 2017 03:43PM MaryToU wrote: I had cut my hair short two weeks after I started Chemo, then a majority of what was left came out just before my second treatment, which are 3 weeks apart. I had no choice but to shave what was left, or have big bald spots on my head.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
